title: Epcot at 40: How Walt Disney World inspired me to become a technologist
description: A family trip to Florida 50 years ago set me along the path to becoming a technology professional.

title: Kinetic Kudu is now available as an Ubuntu beta release
description: Canonical has released the first beta of Ubuntu 22.10, and here are all the details.

title: QLED TV deal: Samsung 55-inch QN85B Series TV is 21% off
description: Need a great living room TV? The Samsung Neo QLED TV offers Dolby Atmos, Object Tracking Sound, and comes with Alexa built in -- all for 21% off its original price.

title: Do you dream of digitizing your entire book collection? This book scanner can help
description: Review: If you want to convert your entire book, magazine, and resource library into digital form, then this is the device you need.

title: Streaming deal: Google Chromecast just dropped to $20
description: Whether you're in the Google smart home system or just want a Fire Stick or Roku alternative, the Chromecast promises easy streaming--– and just as easy a setup.

title: Microsoft's Industry Clouds: More than just a bunch of services bundles
description: Microsoft's push to sell pre-integrated cloud services tailored for specific industries is becoming an increasingly big part of its sales approach. Here's an explainer on what's happening with Microsoft's Industry Cloud work.

title: Here come the new Red Hat Enterprise Linux distros
description: Red Hat ups its security and developer game in its RHEL 8.7 and 9.1 betas.

title: Microsoft: New Exchange Server zero-days already used in attacks, expect more to come
description: Attackers have already exploited the newly disclosed Microsoft Exchange Server vulnerabilities, so act now.

title: Linux: AWS now offers Ubuntu virtual desktops for developers and engineers
description: Amazon Web Services now offers Ubuntu virtual desktops from $23 a month.

title: Linux 6.0 arrives as Linus Torvalds promises 'core new things' ahead
description: Linux 6.0 is a major new kernel number, but doesn't represent big fundamental changes. That's coming in Linux 6.1.

title: This classic iPhone has just been designated 'vintage' by Apple
description: An iPhone model that brought several firsts to the smartphone market has taken another step in its hardware lifecycle.

title: Optus reveals extent of data breach, but stays mum on how it happened
description: Of the 9.8 million customers impacted by the data breach, 1.2 million have at least one form of identification number that is valid, says the Singtel-owned Australian operator, adding that it has brought in Deloitte to investigate the breach, including how it occurred.

title: The NASA DART mission smashed a spacecraft into an asteroid. Now what?
description: Part one of the DART mission was a success. ZDNET spoke with a DART mission leader to find out if we'll avoid the fate of the dinosaurs.

title: Gaming PC deals: Save $350 on the Alienware Aurora R13
description: You can save hundreds of dollars on Alienware's futuristic desktop gaming PC, available with customizable specifications.

title: Gaming PC deal: Save $350 on the Alienware Aurora R13
description: You can save hundreds of dollars on Alienware's futuristic desktop gaming PC, available with customizable specifications.

title: This compact Bluetooth portable speaker costs just $30
description: This small Bluetooth speaker delivers excellent audio anywhere for up to 7 hours on a single charge.

title: This refurbished 128GB Wi-Fi-only iPad Mini 4 is just $235
description: Take this 0.65lb iPad Mini everywhere to stream your favorite entertainment and even breeze through your daily tasks with its 10-hour battery.

title: The 5 best earbuds of 2022
description: Looking for the best earbuds? ZDNET's top picks have active noise cancellation and voice assistant capabilities, and most importantly, they don't fall out of your ears.

title: The 5 best action cameras of 2022
description: A good action camera can capture adventure with hands-off control. But, whether you're skiing or rock climbing, GoPro is no longer your only option. Insta360 and Osmo, for instance, have compelling action cameras worth trying. But which one is the best?

title: The 5 best mesh Wi-Fi systems of 2022: Top routers
description: Having a reliable Wi-Fi connection is a must. But in a larger building or home, there can be dead spots that don't receive a strong signal. That's where the best mesh Wi-Fi systems can provide the reliability you need wherever you are.

title: The 5 best surge protectors of 2022
description: You may have heard that keeping your devices safe during a power surge is essential. Well, it's true -- but not all surge protectors offer the same protection. So, find out why we like certain ones, including our favorite: The Anker PowerPort Strip 12.

title: How to identify any plant with a $20 app
description: NatureID can identify your plants, tell you when they're sick, make recommendations about treatment and maintenance, and even remind you to water them.
